price: Kuma abin da kuka ciyar daga ciyarwa, kõ kuka cika alwãshi daga wani bãkance, to, lalle ne, Allah Yana sanin sa. Kuma azzãlumai bã su da wasu mataimaka.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن نَّفَقَةٍ أَوۡ نَذَرۡتُم مِّن نَّذۡرٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُهُۥۗ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ أَنصَارٍ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā anfaqtum min nafaqatin aw nadhartum min nadhrin fa-inna al-laha yaʿlamuhu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
